product_name: Guardian Pocket Clip Folding Knife Set - 2014 Closeout
long_description: This versatile knife set features 2 all stainless-steel knives with tanto and drop clip blade shapes for precision cuts in the field, campsite or fix-it-yourself garage workstations.
short_description: This versatile knife set features 2 all stainless-steel knives with tanto and drop clip blade shapes for precision cuts in the field, campsite or fix-it-yourself garage workstations.
